softwareApplication.name: Flowxtra ATS Recruiting Software
softwareApplication.description: Flowxtra ATS is an AI-powered applicant tracking system built for UK hiring teams. Publish unlimited vacancies, automate candidate filtering, and collaborate with hiring managers while staying compliant with GDPR and UK ICO guidelines.

offers.name: Free Forever Plan – Unlimited Job Postings

mainEntity.name: Does Flowxtra ATS support UK hiring workflows?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Flowxtra includes UK-ready templates, GDPR/ICO consent tracking, and multiposting to British job boards.

mainEntity.name: Is the ATS free to start?

acceptedAnswer.text: The Free Forever plan offers unlimited postings, AI filtering, and pipelines with no credit card required. Upgrade for advanced analytics and API access.
